text:
We're part of the Amazon
customer service organization
and we primarily do three things.

We build self-service
options for our customers.

We build tools for our
customer service associates,

and we develop the infrastructure
that all of that runs on.

We service customers
worldwide across 22 stores.

We help customers who
are awaiting a package.

We also assist customers
who are watching live events
or gaming of Amazon gaming,

and we help drivers deliver
billions of packages.

We use Amazon Bedrock
for our foundational models.

We also use Amazon Connect
for our core infrastructure,

and along with other
AWS services, we're able

to offer Gen AI powered
experiences for our customers,
and our associates.

One of the ways we really
benefit from a Amazon Connect is

its worldwide footprint with
telephony infrastructure.

It allows us to deploy Amazon
Connect instances across
multiple regions and be able to offer

customers a local number to
dial into or toll free number.
Another way that we innovate is use this
portfolio of products.

So one of the things that we're
really excited about is this

Contact Lens and the ability
to have real time transcription
of our contacts,

and also to have sentiment
analysis that can,

we can use then to improve
customer experiences.
This year we're really excited about
improving customer outcomes.

Of course, we're going to use
generative ai.

For example, we're looking to use
Amazon Nova with Amazon Connect

to really be able to improve
customer experiences at every

part of their journey, not just
trying to resolve the issue.
We work to offer delightful
and convenient customer experiences,
and AWS allows us to do that.
